alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 9:43PM EST until March 08 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from Seymour through Williams. .Minor flooding is ongoing along the East Fork White river and several tributaries due to 1.5 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding along the East Fork White River is expected from Seymour to Williams, with the crest through Seymour. Flooding along many smaller tributaries that has not already ended will end by Tuesday. Flooding will continue through the end of the week on the lower portion of the East Fork White River river. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding affecting agricultural lands. Many county and state roads in flood plain become impassable by high water, including SR 235 East of Medora, SR 258 East of Cortland, CR 725 N and possibly SR 39 south of Tampico. High water affects county roads near Vallonia and Shields, Ewing Road near Brownstown, CR 525 N near Seymour wastewater treatment plant, Honeytown Road and possibly SR 250 east of Dudleytown and SR 256 west of Austin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Monday was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue falling to 5.8 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
